author: andreas
content: Thanks. Well, for me it's really about seeing in B&W. Of course I shoot in RAW+JPEG as always and Lightroom just ignores the settings used to create the in-camera JPEG. Thus in Lightroom I see the images in color, and then I decide how I progress: using B&W as I've originally seen the image, or just staying in color.
